bill_title: to permit a crime victim to have access to certain information about the person arrested for committing the crime.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to permit a crime victim to have access to certain information about the person arrested for committing the crime. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. Any law enforcement agency shall supply to the victim of a crime, upon request of the victim, the name and address of the person arrested for committing the crime and any picture of the person taken by the law enforcement agency. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.016 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
